item.name: Application
item.description: Operations relating to Application management, including both Enterprise Applications, and Application Registrations.

item.name: Application Registration
item.description: Operations relating to Application Registration management.

item.name: Authentication
item.description: Operations relating to Authentication, including authentication methods and password policies.

item.name: Licensing
item.description: Operations relating to user and group licensing.

item.name: Permissions
item.description: Read-only operations relating to assigned permissions and roles.

item.name: Policies
item.description: Operations relating to policy management, including Conditional Access policies.

item.name: Reports
item.description: Operations relating to report generation and management.

item.name: Service Principal
item.description: Operations relating to Service Principal (Enterprise Application) management.

item.name: Users and Groups
item.description: Operations relating to user and group management.
